mapper.select: SELECT t.c_id, t.c_name FROM sys_article_category t WHERE t.c_status != 0 ORDER BY t.c_order ASC

SELECT t.c_id, t.c_name, t.c_grade, t.c_intro, t.c_keywords, t.c_status, t.c_order, t.creator, (SELECT x.u_nickname from sys_authz_user_profile x where x.u_id = t.creator) as c_uname, t.create_time FROM sys_article_category t WHERE t.c_id = #{id}
